paramInformation.label: Battery Report Period
paramInformation.description: The period is set in 15 minute increments (multiply the value by 15)

metadata.inclusion:
1. Press & hold inclusion/exclusion button for 5 seconds until LED turns on.
2. Open sensor will try inclusion for 30 seconds when button is released.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Press & hold inclusion/exclusion button for 5 seconds until LED turns on.
2. Open sensor will try exclusion when button is released.
3. If exclusion is successful, LED will blink 3 times with 250ms interval.
metadata.reset:
1. Press & hold inclusion/exclusion button for 10 seconds.
2. LED will blink while holding the button.
3. Factory reset will be done in 10 seconds after releasing button and blink 5 times with 100ms interval.

â€» Please use factory reset only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
